facts.fact_text: Retail sales in the Czech Republic rose by 1.8% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Retail sales in the Czech Republic rose by 1.8% year-on-year in December 2025

facts.fact_text: The 1.8% increase was sharply lower than market forecasts of a 3.5% gain.

evidences.evidence_text: sharply lower than market forecasts of a 3.5% gain

facts.fact_text: The 1.8% increase slowed from a downwardly revised 4.5% increase in the previous month.

evidences.evidence_text: slowing from a downwardly revised and five-month high of 4.5% increase in the previous month

facts.fact_text: The latest figure marked the lowest reading since December 2023.

evidences.evidence_text: The latest figure also marked the lowest reading since December 2023

facts.fact_text: Sales declined mainly for information and communication equipment (-1.8% vs -1.5%) and cultural and recreation goods (-1% vs 3%).

evidences.evidence_text: Among the non-food sector, sales declined mainly for information and communication equipment (-1.8% vs -1.5%) and cultural and recreation goods (-1% vs 3%)

facts.fact_text: On a seasonally adjusted monthly basis, retail trade fell by 0.1% in December, reversing a 0.8% gain in the preceding period.

evidences.evidence_text: On a seasonally adjusted monthly basis, retail trade fell by 0.1% in December, reversing a 0.8% gain in the preceding period.

evidence.evidence_text: Retail sales in the Czech Republic rose by 1.8% year-on-year in December 2025
The latest figure also marked the lowest reading since December 2023, driven by softer sales increase for non-food products (2% vs 6.3% in November).
